title: Succession from annual plants to hardwood trees 1

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

The diagram above shows the succession of communities from annual plants to hardwood trees in a specific area over a period of time.
content.question: Discuss the expected changes in biodiversity as the stages of succession progress as shown in the diagram above.

frqParts.text: Discuss the expected changes in biodiversity as the stages of succession progress as shown in the diagram above.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
